sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The authors wish to acknowledge Iranian Red Crescent Society that their worthy data were used in our review for work on impacts of flood on health.

sec.title: Authors' contributions
sec.p: Azar Shokri conceived and designed the current study and, with Seyed Ahmad Hashemi, guided the work. Sadaf Sabzevari drafted the manuscript. All authors contributed to the writing of the manuscript and read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The study was approved by the Medical Ethics Committee of the North Khorasan University of Medical Sciences. (Ethic ID: IR.NKUMS.REC.1398.027).

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The data that support the findings of this study are available online from the references that have been cited in this study.
